title: Ebert & Roeper - 03.09.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  March 9th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0997047/]College Road Trip[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0453548/]Snow Angels[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0200465/]The Bank Job[/url] - (first reviewed last week)
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0804505/]Married Life[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0970468/]Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0870090/]City of Men[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0451079/]Horton Hears a Who![/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0808279/]Funny Games[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0997047/]College Road Trip[/url]  -  (big thumbs) down - (big thumbs) down
-- Martin Lawrence - Raven-SymonÃƒÂ© - Donny Osmond

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0453548/]Snow Angels[/url]  -  (huge thumbs) up - (great film) up  -  ( will possibly end up on 2008 top 10 lists )
-- written & directed by David Gordon Green - ( George Washington - All the Real Girls - Undertow )
-- Kate Beckinsale - Michael Angarano - Olivia Thirlby - Sam Rockwell

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0200465/]The Bank Job[/url]  -  (big thumbs) up - (big thumbs) up  -  ( FIRST REVIEWED ON LAST WEEKS SHOW )
-- directed by Roger Donaldson - ( The World&#039;s Fastest Indian - Thirteen Days - Smash Palace - No Way Out - Cocktail - etc. )
-- Jason Statham - Saffron Burrows - Richard Lintern - David Suchet

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0804505/]Married Life[/url]  -  (not quite) down - (liked it a lot) up
-- Rachel McAdams - Pierce Brosnan - Chris Cooper - Patricia Clarkson

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0970468/]Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day[/url]  -  up - up
-- Amy Adams - Frances McDormand - Lee Pace - CiarÃƒÂ¡n Hinds

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0870090/]City of Men[/url]  -  (big thumbs) up - (big thumbs) up
-- "follow-up of sorts to ... City of God"
-- from Brazil

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0480242/]Dan in Real Life[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Dan-Real-Life-Juliette-Binoche/dp/B00118T632/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1205200683&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0477348/]No Country for Old Men[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Country-Old-Men-Javier-Bardem/dp/B00118T63C/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1205200585&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
